@graph.caption: Slices of wheat and lentil bread on a wooden work surface

@graph.name: Wheat and lentil bread - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Wheat and lentil bread is a great alternative to a store bought loaf. Easy to make and packed full of flavor and goodness.

@graph.name: Wheat and lentil bread
@graph.description: Wheat and lentil bread is a tasty homemade alternative to store bought
recipeIngredient: 1 cup boiled lentils (i used yellow mung bean as it cooks quickly)

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the lentils and add salt, chili and garlic flakes
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the lentils and add salt, chili and garlic flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Sift the wheat flour and baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: Sift the wheat flour and baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Make dough of flour, oil, lentil mix and water.
recipeInstructions.name: Make dough of flour, oil, lentil mix and water.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it stand for 10 mins and knead again.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it stand for 10 mins and knead again.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a loaf and bake on baking sheet for 45 minutes at 350 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a loaf and bake on baking sheet for 45 minutes at 350 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Brush melted butter on top to keep it soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush melted butter on top to keep it soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Some flaxseed can be sprinkled on the top and also added in the dough for some extra texture.
recipeInstructions.name: Some flaxseed can be sprinkled on the top and also added in the dough for some extra texture.

@graph.keywords: homemade bread, vegan bread recipe, wheat bread
